name: Pingo (pixeljunkiestudio)
description:
Procedural running and scoring game with a cute animal and colorful landscapes.

Pingo and his friends need your help to put their eggs in a safe place.
How far can you go ? and how much eggs will you save ?

Continious improvments and new stuffs are coming soon:
- New levels and biomes
- New power-ups (passive and active)
- News skins
- New leaderboards (distance, eggs saved, style score...)

Itchi version is free of ads

Attribution:
- Main char and UI from https://www.gameartguppy.com
- Icons made by Google and Freepik from https://www.flaticon.com
- Snowy Hill - Funny and Happy 8 Bit Music and other audio assets from https://www.playonloop.com/2013-music-loops/snowy-hill and https://opengameart.org
